'''Caps''' are a form of head [[armour]] that provide no base [[AC]], but unlike [[helmet]]s, they can be worn by characters with [[beak]]s, [[antennae]], or all but the largest [[horns]]. They can be enchanted up to +2, and are identical to [[wizard hat]]s except for their list of possible [[ego]]s:
*[[Intelligence]] (+3)
*[[See invisible]]
*[[Spirit shield]]
